description: Develop formal terminologies to represent the concepts being described and the relationships between those concepts.
Gather/curate and maintain the individual terms within a terminology.
Create mappings between terminologies using established relationships. Record and preserve the mappings.
Search for relevant terminologies and/or terms within terminologies. Retrieve the search results.
Provide multilingual representations of the concepts within a terminology.
Manual or automated process for annotation of column headers/fields and streams. Could be done in real- or near-real time when the data are generated and subsequently transformed or in delayed mode.
Manual or automated process for annotation of metadata records related to datasets. This is not coupled with data creation.
provision of annotation tools and services
Data discovery based on keywords that come from a controlled vocabulary
Data discovery based on semantic classifications.
Combine datasets from various sources based on semantic information
Use semantic information to check data
Generate output by integrating several datasets
Discovering patterns in large data sets
